field.name: Copyright notice - type
field.definition: the type of license or agreement of the copyright notice

terms.termAndDeftn: others can distribute, remix, tweak, and build upon your work, even commercially, as long as they credit you for the original creation
allows for redistribution, commercial and non-commercial, as long as it is passed along unchanged and in whole, with credit to you

others can remix, tweak, and build upon your work non-commercially, and although their new works must also acknowledge you and be non-commercial, they don’t have to license their derivative works on the same terms
only allows others to download your works and share them with others as long as they credit you, but they can’t change them in any way or use them commercially
others can remix, tweak, and build upon your work non-commercially, as long as they credit you and license their new creations under the identical terms
others can remix, tweak, and build upon your work even for commercial purposes, as long as they credit you and license their new creations under the identical terms
the UCAR employee holding the copyright of the resource has opted out of transferring the copyright to UCAR; this means the resource has restricted access
the copyright holder has licensed the resource to the NCAR Library

dos.practice: For the special agreement with AMS, AGU and Springer, they are still the publishers, so select publisher as the copyright holder and do not select a value for this field of type.
In addition to these best practices, see the copyrightNotice best practices.
If unsure about rights information, choose Unknown.
